areas.name: The Candle Room
areas.description: The room is empty except for a candle. You can see a doorway.

areas.name: The Lonely Hideout
areas.description: You see an empty bedroll and a dead campfire. You see a hole in the ground in the corner of the room.

areas.name: The Dusty Cave
areas.description: The cave is dark, wet, and cold. You smell trees and fresh air just around the corner...
